Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: மறப்பினும் ஓத்துக் கொளலாகும் பார்ப்பான்பிறப்பொழுக்கங் குன்றக் கெடும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: A Brahman though he should forget the Vedas may recover it by reading; but, if he fail in propriety of conduct even his high birth will be destroyed.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split composition of a Brahmin scholar ('பார்ப்பான்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the left, his mind is shown as having forgotten the Vedas ('மறப்பினும் ஓத்து'). However, he is shown re-learning by diligently studying the sacred texts, and the forgotten knowledge is visibly returning to him as streams of light ('கொளலாகும்'). His status remains intact.
Layered_Composition.Background: On the right, the same Brahmin is shown committing a single act that is a failure in decorum ('ஒழுக்கம் குன்ற'). The moment he does this, his high birth and status, visualized as a radiant, holy thread and a divine aura, instantly shatters and perishes ('பிறப்பு கெடும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: For a Brahmin, forgetting the sacred texts is a recoverable error. However, a failure in good conduct is an irrecoverable one that instantly destroys the very foundation of his high birth.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The contrast between the recoverable knowledge and the irrecoverable status is the key. The shattering of the sacred thread and aura is a powerful, instantaneous visualization of the destruction of his 'birth'.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Irrecoverable loss, catastrophic, cautionary, moral fragility.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The re-learning scene is lit with a hopeful, intellectual light. The scene of the lapse in conduct is marked by a sudden, violent flash of light as the aura shatters, followed by a dark, empty void of lost status.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A diptych shot that contrasts the slow, patient recovery of knowledge with the instant, catastrophic loss of status.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with advanced particle and shattering effects for the sacred aura.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: A dramatic, explosive lighting effect for the moment of ruin.

Cultural_Anchors: When decorum fails, his birth perishes (ஒழுக்கம் குன்ற பிறப்பு கெடும்)
